    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes(SVG.RenderMode renderMode)
      Get the attributes specific to a render mode. Allows tags to modify their attributes during rendering based on the rendering mode. Defaults to the basic Element attributes but can be overridden by Elements to return differing attribute based on mode.

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes(SVG.RenderMode renderMode)

        Get the attributes specific to a render mode. Allows tags to modify their attributes during rendering based on the rendering mode. Defaults to the basic Element attributes but can be overridden by Elements to return differing attribute based on mode.

        Parameters:
        renderMode - which mode we are rendering in
